transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Mam good morning.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning. Good morning sir. Ji bataiye.
Customer: Mam pehchan.
Hello
Executive: Sir main off pe hu aaj.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Kaam tha mam.
Executive: Ha sir kab main aapko parso hi connect kar paungi abhi to kyuki main family function attend karne aayi hu. Kuch urgent hai main kisi aur se baat kara du?
Customer: Nahi mam aisa kuch urgent nahi hai wo kya hai catalog update kiye the maine to main keh raha tha portal mein update ho jate wo.
Executive: Achcha kyuki sir abhi network vagaira bhi nahi hai na mere paas isiliye.
Customer: Okay mam aap Monday aap main Monday connect karti hu aap mujhe apna name bata dijiye ek bar.
Executive: Mam Sagar Sahu Digambar Sahu.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha okay. Ji mam Durga se. Ya I will connect you on Monday okay.
Customer: Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know if catalog is updated.

- Executive is on leave due to family function.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, connect
